item.description:
We are going to have Japanese Evening Table in Cambridge side!

Whether you're learning Japanese or English, buy a drink, join the table, and practice your new language in a friendly and relaxed environment. If you're a beginner or just interested in culture, you'll fit in fine! Don't miss out on this opportunity to learn and practice over a few drinks. If you will be joining us, please use public transportation.  

*** Important notice ***

Please bring your ID or Passport. No ID No Drinks. Also you must be over 21 y/o.

Due to the Bruins game night, I am going to make a reservation to hold our table. RSVP by Thursday 12pm, if you plan to come over at 7PM, and please be on time :)

As usual, you can come in later. In this case I can't guarantee your seat.

Thanks,

Mika
item.why: for convenience of people living in Cambridge side
item.name: Japanese evening table in Cambridge side
